channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amazon is cracking down on RTO holdouts and ‘speaking directly’ to employees who haven’t spent enough time in the office
item.description: Amazon is getting more serious about its return-to-office mandate—it’s now having one-on-one chats with employees who aren't spending enough "meaningful" time in the office.

item.title: Flights grounded and passengers warned of delays amid global IT outage
item.description: A slew of airlines said operations would be impacted on one of the busiest flight days of the year.

item.title: CrowdStrike says it's identified problem hitting Windows computers and is fixing
Stellantis tells owners of over 24,000 Chrysler Pacifica hybrid minivans to park outside because the batteries can catch fire
item.description: The company said Thursday that it's recalling certain 2017 through 2021 Chrysler Pacifica plug-in hybrids, mainly in North America. Some are being recalled for a second time. All can still be driven.

item.title: Education Department to pause student loan payments for millions amid legal battle
item.description: The U.S. Department of Education says it will pause millions of student loan borrowers payments while it defends its SAVE repayment plan against legal challenges.

item.title: CrowdStrike says it's identified problem hitting Windows computer and is fixing
Donald Trump uses GOP nomination speech to urge Americans to heal ‘discord and division’ after assassination attempt
item.description: Trump’s address, the longest convention speech in modern history at just under 93 minutes, marked the climax and conclusion of a massive four-day Republican pep rally.

item.title: Friday's analyst calls: Netflix earnings reaction, chipmaker to pop 20%
item.description: Netflix and a semiconductor maker were among the stocks being talked about by analysts on Friday.

item.title: Citi advises investors to ‘election proof’ their portfolios — here’s how
Puerto Rico will get $325 million in federal funding to boost solar and battery storage projects as power outages persist
item.description: The program, funded by the U.S. Department of Energy, will target community centers and healthcare facilities, as well as common areas in subsidized, multi-family housing.

item.title: CrowdStrike shares tank 15% in premarket after major outage hits businesses worldwide
item.description: Cybersecurity firm CrowdStrike saw its shares plunge Friday in premarket trading, after an update led to a major outage, impacting businesses globally.

item.title: CrowdStrike shares slump 13% in premarket trade
Tesla to power France’s biggest battery storage facility—boosting the nation’s capacity to store green electricity
item.description: U.K. developer Harmony Energy Ltd. has begun construction. The battery system will be fully operational by the end of next year.

item.title: CrowdStrike issue causes major outage affecting businesses around the world
item.description: An update by cybersecurity firm CrowdStrike led to a major IT outage on Friday, impacting businesses around the world.

item.title: Airlines grounded, computers globally hit by outages
